Posts.Content: Oct 18, 2018 07:33PM NJGal75 wrote: Hi Gigi. Just checking to see how you're doing. I just had my 1st RO appointment following my lumpectomy and SNB (node negative). Since focal LVI was found, RO is suggesting aggressive rads for 3 levels of nodes (i.e., including supra-clavicle). I'm wondering what radiation treatment you ended up following and how things are going. Have 1stMO appointment tomorrow!
Posts.Title: How long should radiation treatment be stage 1 with LVI? GigiBC318 GigiBC318
